title: LDU QUITO
author: LDU QUITO
content: I got small amount of btc and need urgently for sell in binancebut was slow for confirmSomeone help me accelerate97abf739465cd5fc791ea18cfb6fec1512be656d90941a9efd836d0e3963e8adThanks!

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: LDU QUITO on June 30, 2022, 05:12:49 PMI got small amount of btc and need urgently for sell in binancebut was slow for confirmSomeone help me accelerate97abf739465cd5fc791ea18cfb6fec1512be656d90941a9efd836d0e3963e8adThanks!It should be confirmed next 10-12 hours max. No need to accelerate. Tried to do it using via btc free fast thingy but it says the fee is too low.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: saxydev on June 30, 2022, 05:37:49 PMTried to do it using via btc free fast thingy but it says the fee is too low.The minimum fee to use ViaBTC free accelerator is 0.0001 btc/kb (10 sat/byte). The fee used is 10.235 sat/vbyte (6.415 sat/byte), one of the reasons it is not successfully included for acceleration. I will also suggest LDU QUITO to wait, the transaction will be confirmed if the mempool become less congested, even not that congested for now.Edit: the transaction has be confirmed.
